trans-unit.source: Represents a set of quadratic Bezier segments.
trans-unit.target: 代表一組的二次方貝茲區段。

trans-unit.source: This class enables you to specify a collection of points to create multiple quadratic Bezier curve segments.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別可讓您指定的點，才能建立二次方貝茲曲線線段的集合。

trans-unit.source: With a <xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment>, you can specify only two points to create a single quadratic Bezier curve segment.
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment>，您可以指定只有兩個點來建立單一的二次方貝茲曲線線段。</xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyQuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyQuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyQuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> class with the specified collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> objects and a value specifying whether the segments are stroked.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyQuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>具有指定的集合類別<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>物件和值，指定是否圖案的區段。

trans-unit.source: The collection of points that specify the geometry of the Bezier curve segments.
trans-unit.target: 指定的貝茲曲線線段幾何的點集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to stroke the segments; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示要繪製的區段。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyQuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyQuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyQuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyQuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref> that defines this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyQuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"> </xref> ，定義這<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyQuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The first two points in the collection specify the control point and end point of the first curve segment.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的前兩個點指定的控制項控點和第一個曲線線段的結束點。

trans-unit.source: The next two points specify the control point and end point of the second curve segment, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 下面兩個點指定的控制項控點和結束點的第二個曲線線段，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: The collection should contain an even number of points.
trans-unit.target: 集合應該包含偶數個點。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A collection that defines the shape of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyQuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 集合，其中定義這個圖形<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyQuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空集合。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyQuadraticBezierSegment.Points*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyQuadraticBezierSegment.Points*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyQuadraticBezierSegment.Points*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
